item.title: The Threat of Google DeepMind
item.description: The Threat of Google’s DeepMind [ read more ] If you consider Google is the leader globally in artificial intelligence, DeepMind is their crown jewel. 5 min read What is the next big thing in AI and ML? [ read more ] And is there one? 16 min read Aspect-Based Opinion Mining (NLP with Python) [ read more ] If you’ve heard of Uber or Amazon, you may be one of 40 million (Uber) or over 310 million (Amazon) active… 9 min read
